import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; import { GoogleMap, LoadScript, Marker } from '@react-google-maps/api'; const featuredListings = [ { id: 1, title: "Modern Studio in Downtown", price: 1200, beds: 1, baths: 1, sqft: 500, image: "/room1.jpg", lat: 40.7128, lng: -74.0060 }, { id: 2, title: "Cozy 2BR near University", price: 1800, beds: 2, baths: 1, sqft: 800, image: "/room2.jpg", lat: 40.7306, lng: -73.9352 }, { id: 3, title: "Luxury Loft with City View", price: 2500, beds: 2, baths: 2, sqft: 1200, image: "/room3.jpg", lat: 40.7488, lng: -73.9857 }, ]; const mapContainerStyle = { height: "400px", width: "100%", }; const center = { lat: 40.7128, lng: -74.0060, }; function Home() { const [searchParams, setSearchParams] = useState({ location: '', priceRange: '', beds: '', }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setSearchParams((prevParams) => ({ ...prevParams, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Search params:', searchParams); }; return (
